divs: Sighting DetailsI was an infant but my mother recalls a chilling account of what I consider UFO (either unidentified military or otherwise). Driving to family cottage in Northern Michigan, suddenly car lights, radio, battery die and object appeared in the sky hovering at same pace. gets creepy from there....
Summary: Driving to family cottage in Northern Michigan, suddenly car lights, radio, battery die and object appeared in the sky hovering at same pace
